attributes.action: Give  our Troops a medal every time they go to a war zone.
attributes.additional_details:
To present our Troops with a medal every time they go on tour to a war Zone and not just the 1 medal if they have been in the same war zone.
For example if our troops go to Afghanistan they get 1 medal no matter how many times they go.
I do not think this is fair if our troops go to the same war zone more than once they deserve a medal everytime they go.
